NextRun.name: Next Run
NextRun.help:
Updated automatically after completing the task to set next scheduled run, typically not manually modified
However you can force immediate scheduling if you clear this text field

ServerUpdate.name: Server Update
ServerUpdate.help: Series of server refresh time(s) as to when this task will next run, this is automatically converted to respective time zone, generally do not need to modify

Serial.name: Serial
Serial.help:
Common emulator Serial can be queried in the list below
Use "auto" to auto-detect emulators, but if multiple emulators are running or use emulators that do not support auto-detect, "auto" cannot be used and serial must be filled in manually
Default serial for select emulators:
- BlueStacks 127.0.0.1:5555
- BlueStacks4 Hyper-V use "bluestacks4-hyperv", "bluestacks4-hyperv-2" for multi instance, and so on
- BlueStacks5 Hyper-V use "bluestacks5-hyperv", "bluestacks5-hyperv-1" for multi instance, and so on
- NoxPlayer 127.0.0.1:62001
- NoxPlayer64bit 127.0.0.1:59865
- MuMuPlayer/MuMuPlayer X 127.0.0.1:7555
- MuMuPlayer12 127.0.0.1:16384
- MemuPlayer 127.0.0.1:21503
- LDPlayer emulator-5554 or 127.0.0.1:5555
- WSA use "wsa-0" to make the game run in the background, which needs to be controlled or closed by third-party software
If there are multiple emulator instances running, the default is reserved for one of them and the others will use different serials to avoid conflicts
Open console.bat and run `adb devices` to find them or follow the emulator's official tutorial

GameClient.name: Game Client
GameClient.help: When using cloud, you will be automatically queued to log in. Cloud game is available in CN only

PackageName.name: Game Server
PackageName.help: Can't distinguish different regions of oversea servers, please select the server manually.

GameLanguage.name: In-game Text Language
GameLanguage.help: Currently, only Simplified Chinese and English are supported. Please set the text language in game to one of them.

ScreenshotMethod.name: Screenshot Method
ScreenshotMethod.help:
When using auto-select, a benchmark will be performed and automatically changed to the fastest screenshot method.
General speed: DroidCast_raw >> aScreenCap_nc > ADB_nc >>> aScreenCap > uiautomator2 ~= ADB.
Run Tools - Performance Test to find the fastest method.

ControlMethod.name: Control Method
ControlMethod.help:
Speed: MaaTouch = minitouch >>> uiautomator2 ~= ADB
MaaTouch is recommended

AdbRestart.name: Try to restart adb when no device found

_info.name: Emulator Settings
_info.help: The following values are auto-filled according to "Serial", if you don’t understand, please don't modify them

SaveError.name: Record Exception
SaveError.help: Records exception and log into directory for review or sharing

ScreenshotLength.name: Record Screenshot(s)
ScreenshotLength.help: Number of screenshots saved when exception occurs

OnePushConfig.name: Error notify config
OnePushConfig.help:
When Alas cannot handle exception, send a message through Onepush. Configuration document: 
https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/Onepush-configuration-%5BEN%5D

ScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s)
ScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.1 ~ 0.3, can help reduce CPU on high-end PCs

CombatScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s) In Combat
CombatScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.1 ~ 1.0, can help reduce CPU during battle

WhenTaskQueueEmpty.name: When Task Queue is Empty
WhenTaskQueueEmpty.help: Close AL when there are no pending tasks, can help reduce CPU

_info.name: Dungeon Settings
_info.help: Brush a dungeon until trailblaze power runs out

Use.name: Use Friend Support
Use.when_daily: Use Only When Required by Dailies

Character.name: Support Character
Character.help:
Select a friend support character, if not found, select the default (first) role
Support character should not be the same as the character in the team, recommended to prioritize friends.

_info.name: Echo of War Settings
_info.help: Echo of War is still able to challenge if limit is reached. Consume no trailblaze power, get no reward, but complete daily quests.

Name.name: Dungeon Name
Name.Echo_of_War_Borehole_Planet_Old_Crater: Borehole Planet's Old Crater (Herta Space Station)

_info.name: Achievable Quests
_info.help:
When the task status is "Not Set", you need to configure the SRC as required to achieve the quest
Note: Please keep more tasks in "Achievable" status, otherwise SRC may not be able to grind 500 activity

Clear_Calyx_Golden_1_times.name: Clear Calyx (Golden) 1 time(s)
Clear_Calyx_Golden_1_times.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task

Clear_Stagnant_Shadow_1_times.name: Clear Stagnant Shadow 1 time(s)
Clear_Stagnant_Shadow_1_times.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task

Clear_Cavern_of_Corrosion_1_times.name: Clear Cavern of Corrosion 1 time(s)
Clear_Cavern_of_Corrosion_1_times.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task

In_a_single_battle_inflict_3_Weakness_Br.name: In a single battle, inflict 3 Weakness Break of different Types
In_a_single_battle_inflict_3_Weakness_Br.help: Achievable by default, will do Himeko trial

Inflict_Weakness_Break_5_times.name: Inflict Weakness Break 5 times
Inflict_Weakness_Break_5_times.help: Achievable by default, will do Himeko trial

Defeat_a_total_of_20_enemies.name: Defeat a total of 20 enemies
Defeat_a_total_of_20_enemies.help: Achievable by default, will do Himeko trial

Complete_Forgotten_Hall_1_time.name: Complete Forgotten Hall 1 time
Complete_Forgotten_Hall_1_time.help: Achievable by default, will choose the first four characters to do stage 1 once, please ensure that account build is sufficient to do stage 1

Complete_Echo_of_War_1_times.name: Complete Echo of War 1 time(s)
Complete_Echo_of_War_1_times.help: Need to configure and enable the "Echo of War" task

Use_an_Ultimate_to_deal_the_final_blow_1.name: Use an Ultimate to deal the final blow 1 time
Use_an_Ultimate_to_deal_the_final_blow_1.help: Achievable by default, will do Himeko trial

Salvage_any_Relic.name: Salvage any Relic
Salvage_any_Relic.help: Achievable by default, will salvage the first one in reverse order of rarity

Use_Consumables_1_time.name: Use Consumables 1 time
Use_Consumables_1_time.help: Achievable by default, will use gear. If there is no material, synthesized before use

Dispatch_1_assignments.name: Dispatch 1 assignment(s)
Dispatch_1_assignments.help: Need to configure and enable the "Assignment" task

Complete_Simulated_Universe_1_times.name: Complete Simulated Universe 1 time(s)

Enter_combat_by_attacking_enemie_Weaknes.name: Enter combat by attacking enemies' Weakness and win 3 time(s)
Enter_combat_by_attacking_enemie_Weaknes.help: Achievable by default, will do Himeko trial

Use_Technique_2_times.name: Use Technique 2 time(s)
Use_Technique_2_times.help: Achievable by default, will go to the abyssal 1 and use technique twice

Destroy_3_destructible_objects.name: Destroy 3 destructible object(s)
Destroy_3_destructible_objects.help: Achievable by default, will do Himeko trial

Obtain_victory_in_combat_with_Support_Ch.name: Obtain victory in combat with Support Characters 1 time(s)
Obtain_victory_in_combat_with_Support_Ch.help: Need to configure and enable the "Dungeon" task, configure support settings also

Level_up_any_Light_Cone_1_times.name: Level up any Light Cone 1 time(s)

Use_the_Omni_Synthesizer_1_times.name: Use the Omni-Synthesizer 1 time(s)
Use_the_Omni_Synthesizer_1_times.help: Achievable by default, will synthesize low-rarity material

BattlePassQuestTrailblazePower.name: Consume a total of 100 Trailblaze Power (1400 Trailblazer Power max)

_info.name: Assignment Settings
_info.help:
Claim rewards and dispatch, handling specified assignments first
If the assignment limit is not reached after that, others will be dispatched according to preset priority (EXP Materials/Credits → Character Materials → Synthesis Materials)

DomainStrategy.name: Domain Strategy
DomainStrategy.help:
Prefer Combat: Suitable for normal builds, longer clear time
Prefer Occurrence: Require efficient builds, shorter clear time

UseStamina.name: Farm Planers Using Trailblase Power
UseStamina.help: Task "Dungeon" will no longer run, and all trailblaze power will be used first to claim immersion rewards, except for double events.

CustomBlessingFilter.name: Custom Blessing Filter
CustomBlessingFilter.help: Only takes effect when "Preset Blessing Filter" is "custom"

CustomCurioFilter.name: Custom Curio Filter
CustomCurioFilter.help: Only takes effect when "Preset Curio Filter" is "custom"

CustomResonanceFilter.name: Custom Resonance Filter
CustomResonanceFilter.help: Only takes effect when "Preset Resonance Filter" is "custom"

SelectionStrategy.name: Index Locked
SelectionStrategy.before-random: Select only when nothing satisfy the filter

DebugMode.name: Dev Mode
DebugMode.help: No stop conditions, no error handling, stop when encountering an error. Please report errors according to the doc: https://github.com/LmeSzinc/StarRailCopilot/wiki/RogueMap_cn

_info.name: Dialogue Clicker
_info.help: Tools need to stop the scheduler and then run independently

Enable.name: Dialogue Clicker
Enable.help: Monitor game, automatically click dialogue, phone chatting, and blessing in simulated universe (follow the simulated universe task settings)

Toast.DisableTranslateMode: Click here to disable translate mode
Toast.ClickToUpdate: New update available, click here to update

AddAlas.FileExist: A config with the same name exists, please choose another one
AddAlas.InvalidChar: Config name cannot contain any of the following characters: .\/:*?"<>|

Update.UpdateWait: Waiting for all alas complete current task
Update.UpdateFailed: Update failed. Logs can be found in ./log/*_gui.txt
Update.Author: Author
Update.DisabledWarn: Updater module is disabled. You need to manually restart Alas to update

Remote.NotRunning: Not running, server disconnected or offline
Remote.NotEnable: Disabled, set webui password in deploy.yaml and enable remote access
Remote.SSHNotInstall: No SSH command in your system. Please refer to the tutorial to download or install one
